# PED::SET_PED_MAX_MOVE_BLEND_RATIO

## Summary
Set the max move blend ratio a ped can move at - needs to be called everyframe, or will revert to sprint

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **FLOAT** moveBlendRatio
